params.name: [options]
params.description:
an options object. The following properties are available: * `title`: confirm title (optional, defaults to "Confirm")
* `buttonLabels`: Array of strings specifying button labels (optional, defaults to ["OK","Cancel"]).

name: confirm

returns.description: Promise that is resolved with the index of the tapped button as an argument.

usage:
```coffeescript
# Basic usage
supersonic.notification.confirm("You are awesome!")

# With options
supersonic.notification.confirm("I'm a confirm!", {
  title: "Custom Title"
  buttonLabels: ["Yes", "Close"]
})
```
